      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Reaction of copper oxide and hydrochloric acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion des Kupferoxids und der Salzsäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction de l'oxyde de cuivre et de l'acide 
chlorhydrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação do óxido de cobre e do ácido 
hydrochloric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione dell'ossido di rame e dell'acido 
cloridrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση του οξειδίου χαλκού και του υδροχλωρικού 
οξέος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción del óxido de cobre y del ácido 
hidroclórico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This balanced equation shows the reaction of copper oxide and hydrochloric acid to produce copper chloride and water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">product</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reactant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese ausgeglichene Gleichung zeigt die Reaktion 
des Kupferoxids und der Salzsäure zur Erzeugniskupferchlorverbindung 
und -wasser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette équation équilibrée montre la réaction 
de l'oxyde de cuivre et de l'acide chlorhydrique au chlorure et à 
l'eau de en cuivre de produit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta equação equilibrada mostra a reação do 
óxido de cobre e do ácido hydrochloric ao cloreto e à água do 
cobre do produto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa equazione equilibrata mostra la reazione 
dell'ossido di rame e dell'acido cloridrico al cloruro ed all'acqua 
del rame dei prodotti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ισορροπημένη εξίσωση εμφανίζει την αντίδραση 
του οξειδίου χαλκού και του υδροχλωρικού οξέος στο χλωρίδιο και 
το ύδωρ χαλκού προϊόντων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ecuación equilibrada muestra la reacción 
del óxido de cobre y del ácido hidroclórico al cloruro y al agua 
del cobre del producto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
